lyrics:
24 contributorshurt somebody lyricsverse 1 noah kahan
taking it slowly
im afraid to be lonely
nobody told me
its harder than i thought to tell the truth
its gonna leave you in pieces
all alone with your demons
and i know that we need this
but ive been too afraid to follow through

chorus noah kahan
hold me close and i wont leave
cause it hurts when you hurt somebody
so much to say but i dont speak
and i hate that i let you stop me
cause it hurts when you hurt somebody

verse 2 julia michaels
dont know where the time went
stuck in the wrong mindset
and i let the rules bend
when i know that all along theyre made to break eh
you got me searching for reasons
to keep me from leaving
and then i have trouble breathing
i give myself another chance to stay eh
you might also likechorus julia michaels  noah kahan
hold me close and i wont leave
cause it hurts when you hurt somebody
so much to say but i dont speak
and i hate that i let you stop me
cause it hurts when you hurt somebody

bridge noah kahan  julia michaels
one day before you know it you will see
all of the pain and all the irony
youll feel the stinging and youll think of me
cause it hurts when you hurt

chorus noah kahan  julia michaels
hold me close and i wont leave
cause it hurts when you hurt somebody
so much to say but i dont speak
and i hate that i let you stop me oh
hold me close and i wont leave i wont leave
cause it hurts when you hurt somebody somebody yeah
so much to say but i dont speak
and i hate that i let you stop me
cause it hurts when you hurt somebody somebody6embed
